summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 27th Avenue Northwest, from West 75th Street to West 77th Street, by constructing concrete sidewalks, and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Majority Petition No. 115250 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
